title: Create B2B Lubricant Sales Order
description: A sales representative for a major oil company places a bulk order for industrial lubricants for a large manufacturing client.

tasks.description: Look up the client's account and their contract pricing for 'Turbo Oil 560'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client's specific pricing for the requested product is retrieved.

tasks.description: Check inventory for the required quantity at the nearest distribution center.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms sufficient stock is available.

tasks.description: Create a new sales order in the ERP system for the specified quantity and schedule the delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales order is created and a delivery date is confirmed.
